mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (title, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, location, memo, reminder, `repeat`, auth, state, category, color, reg_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{location}, #{memo}, #{reminder}, #{repeat}, #{auth},#{state},#{category},#{color},now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE start_date >= #{firstday} AND end_date <= #{lastday}
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET title=#{title}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=#{endDate}, start_time=#{startTime}, end_time=#{endTime}, location=#{location}, memo=#{memo}, reminder=#{reminder}, `repeat`=#{repeat}, auth=#{auth},state=#{state},category=#{category},color=#{color} WHERE no = #{no}
